alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 8:30PM EDT until October 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Monday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, yards are flooded on Saint George Island, and water will begin covering the road leading to the island, especially if there is wave action. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one to one and a half feet above normal. The next two high tides at Point Lookout are at 3:41 AM early Monday morning and 4:36 PM Monday afternoon. The next two high tides at Coltons Point are at 5:35 AM early Monday morning and 5:51 PM late Monday afternoon. The next two high tides at Piney Point are at 4:59 AM early Monday morning and 5:15 PM late Monday afternoon. Flooding will likely continue through Tuesday, and near moderate flooding is possible during the afternoon high tide cycle Monday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/05 AM 3.0 1.4 1.4 0.5 Minor 02/05 PM 3.2 1.6 1.4 0.5 Minor 03/05 AM 2.9 1.3 1.4 0.5 None 03/05 PM 3.0 1.4 1.3 0.5 Minor 04/06 AM 2.6 1.0 1.2 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
